attributes.action: help end the dog and cat eating trade in chine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is estimated that between 10 and 20 million cats and dogs are eaten in china every year! they are crammed into tiny cages (often suffocating) and then transported to the notorious Hua Nam wild animal market and other markets around the country,they are treated in a barbaric way and tortured. They are neither fed or given water, some dogs are hog-tied and hung live by their legs, cats often boiled alive...the dogs endure and slow painful death,being bludgeoned,all this in a country that is hosting the 2008 olympic games, we need to stop this barbaric evil trade NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
